## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7a632d46c9cda2dc51b4f8dabb8860c8bed1f5c0250dc785770b881f6b88c4d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'subdomainer' @ 1.0.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
